name: Virtual Therapeutic Hedgehog Pet
description:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Hedgehog」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Hedgehog on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Hedgehog moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Hedgehog on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Hedgehog and clean its home.
- Like a real Hedgehog, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Hedgehog by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Hedgehog a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Hedgehog grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Hedgehog with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Hedgehog or already have one and want a virtual Hedgehog to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
